pages.name: start
pages.title: Living Room
pages.body:
"dashing through the snow..."
"on a one horse open slay..."
"over the fields we goooo..."
"laughing all the way... MU HA HA!..."
You groggily come-to with 'Jingle Bells' draining into your ears.  A blurry living room around you gradually comes into focus.  You're lying on a couch, facing a log fireplace.  To your left is a hallway which leads to stairs.  To your right are two large windows.  As you sit up, you take a quick look behind yourself and see a kitchen.  You feel something cold and wet start to run down your forehead.  Wiping it away from your brow you discover it's blood.  That probably explains the splitting headache you have.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: living_room
pages.title: Living Room
pages.body: You are in the living room. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.
pages.short_description: You are in the living room. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: sleep
pages.title: Back to sleep
pages.body:
"...dashing through the snow... on one horse open slay... over the fields we goooo... laughing all the way... HA HA HA!" 
You come-to with 'Jingle Bells' draining into your ears.  Is this song on repeat??  A blurry living room around you gradually comes into focus.  You feel a little better as your head doesn't hurt as much.  To your left is a hallway which leads to stairs.  To your right are two large windows.  You're facing a log fireplace.  As you sit up, you take a quick look behind yourself and see a kitchen.
pages.short_description: You are in the living room. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: grab_log
pages.title: Grab a log from the fireplace
pages.body: You pick up a smoldering hot log from the fireplace.  Pain radiates to your hand as it starts to burn you.

pages.name: burning_log_living_room
pages.title: Living Room
pages.body: You are standing in the living room holding a burning log. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.

pages.name: drop_log
pages.title: Drop the log
pages.body: You drop the log back into the fireplace.  "THAT was a dumb idea," you say to yourself.  You were always one to learn the hard way.

pages.name: hallway_log
pages.title: Hallway
pages.body: You enter the hallway still clutching the burning log.  The pain becomes unbearable as the fire creeps up your arm.  You drop the log.  It lands on the hardwood flooring can catches the floor on fire.  You try desperately to step on the fire to put it out, but this only enrages the flames.  You pass out from the pain and never wake up...

pages.name: kitchen_log
pages.title: Kitchen
pages.body: You enter the hallway still clutching the burning log.  The pain becomes unbearable as the fire creeps up your arm.  You drop the log.  It lands on the hardwood flooring can catches the floor on fire.  You try desperately to step on the fire to put it out, but this only enrages the flames.  You pass out from the pain and never wake up...

pages.name: sleep_log
pages.title: Back to sleep
pages.body: You lay back down on the couch, cradling the burning log (you must have a death wish).  Not soon after, the couch catches fire and you are engulfed in flames.

pages.name: hallway
pages.title: Hallway
pages.body: You are in hallway that is dimly lit by the fireplace in the living room behind you. Immediately your left are some dark, creepy stairs.  In front of you is a door.  The door appears to lead to the outside but it's dark out there.
pages.short_description: You are in the hallway. To your left are stairs.  In front of you is a door leading outside.  Behind you is the living room.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: kitchen
pages.title: Kitchen
pages.body:
Just a normal kitchen - albeit the scattered blood stains on walls and cabinets.  'What happened in here?  Looks like pig was butchered in here...' you think to yourself.
Ahead is what appears to be a bedroom.  To your left is a door that leads outside to a deck.  To your right is a hallway.  Behind you is the living room.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: downstairs_bedroom
pages.title: Bedroom
pages.body: The bedroom is surprisingly slightly lit by large open windows and a waning moon outside.  You flip the lightswitch to try and get some additional light, but nothing happens.  "Power must be out," you think to yourself. There's not much of interest in this room save for a flashlight that's laying on the night stand.  This bedroom doesn't lead anywhere.
pages.short_description: You're in the bedroom.  Behind you is the kitchen.

pages.name: bedroom_add_flashlight
pages.title: Get Flashlight
pages.body: You grab the flashlight and inspect it.  It's got some heft to it. You read the label aloud: "Maglite ML150LR."  You flip it on and light instantly floods the bedroom.  Then you flip it back off to conserve the batteries.

pages.name: up_stairs
pages.title: Up the stairs
pages.body: You slowly make your way up the stairs and notice a trail of blood as you go.  You reach a landing.  Everything is dark.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: explore_landing
pages.title: Explore the landing
pages.body: You start to feel your way around the dark.  You decide to walk straight ahead until you feel a wall.  Then, in a counter-clockwise direction, you walk while feeling the wall until you come to a door frame.  You gracefully slide through the door and then trip over something on the floor and fall into a pool of something cold and wet.  The liquid splashes into your open mouth and you instantly know it's blood.  Panicked, you scramble and slip to your feet and break out into a run toward the landing.  Only, you're not running toward the landing.  You hit the railing of the staircase full speed and flip over the bar.  You fall and break your neck.

pages.name: landing_flashlight
pages.title: Landing
pages.body: You turn on the flashing and start to paint the landing area.  It reveals a large master bedroom on the left. In front of you is a hallway that leads to another room.  To your immediate right is another bedroom.  It appears to be a boy's bedroom judging by the decorations
pages.short_description: You are in the landing area.  To the left is a large master bedroom.  In front of you is a hallway that leads to another room.  To your immediate right is a boy's bedroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: upstairs_hallway
pages.title: Hallway
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: hallway_bathroom
pages.title: Bathroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: girl_bedroom
pages.title: Girl's Bedroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: master_bedroom
pages.title: Master Bedroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: boy_bedroom
pages.title: Boy's Bedroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: master_bathroom
pages.title: Master Bathroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: front_door
pages.title: Front door
pages.body: You are viciously mauled by something in the darkness.  You desperately try to crawl in the house, while the pain exponentially intensifies.  Things go blurry as you succumb to your injuries...
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: flashlight_front_door
pages.title: Front door
pages.body: You open the front door and then turn on your flashlight.  Almost immediately something lunges at you.  Instinctively you slam the door shut and the "thing" smacks into the door with a thud.  You catch your breath and resign to not go outside at this time.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: deck_door
pages.title: Deck Door
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

welcome_message: Welcome to "A Very Bloody Christmas" - a choose your own adventure game.
